overview: Tommy wakes to find himself in Tennessee and in the possession of Crazy George's wallet. On the road and under the influence of whisky, weed and just a little bullshit, Tommy takes the advice to return Crazy George's wallet - which may have been a stupid thing to do in this road movie through Hell, and places further South.
tagline: An art-house horror-flick made down-home in Tennessee.
title: The Legend of Crazy George
